channel.title: Tiny Tiny RSS Reader for Meego
channel.description: ttrss is a Tiny Tiny RSS Reader App for the Nokia N9 smart phone, written using Qt/QML.

item.title: Version 0.4.1
item.description: * now using the RescalingRichText by Martin Grimme instead of WebView * added Ignore SSL cert option to login MainView * remember the ShowAll option * UI improvements * various bugfixes
item.dc:creator: Hauke Schade

item.title: Version 0.3.4
item.description: * show the feed title when browsing an 'All Items' view * show the feed icons when browsing 'All Feeds'
item.dc:creator: Hauke Schade

item.title: Version 0.3.3
item.description: * added a donate button * redesigned the AboutPage * bugfixing * added a loading message, when models empty and loading * updated translation files
item.dc:creator: Hauke Schade

item.title: Version 0.3.2
item.description: * updated translations from transifex * show multiple lines of text in the PageHeader if necessary
item.dc:creator: Hauke Schade

item.title: Version 0.3.0
item.description: * Show Labels * a little code refactoring, should be faster * Load More Button for FeedItems * LoadingIndicator always in PageHeader * Splash Image * Language Updates
item.dc:creator: Hauke Schade

item.title: Version 0.2.4
item.description: * added option to disable autologin * added chinese translation by gwmgdemj * added attachment support thanks to mardy * various bugfixes
item.dc:creator: Hauke Schade

item.title: Version 0.2.3
item.description: * updated czech and french translations * performance improvements * bugfixes
item.dc:creator: Hauke Schade

item.title: Version 0.2.2
item.description: * added czech translation, thanks to Jakub Kožíšek * performance improvements * add/remove feed subscriptions * share feeditems with shareUI
item.dc:creator: Hauke Schade

item.title: Version 0.2.1
item.description: * Added detection of httpauth info in servername input * Added an AutoMark as Read Option, so Feeditems get marked as read, when opening them * Added FastScroll in the FeedItems View
item.dc:creator: Hauke Schade

item.title: Version 0.2.0
item.description: * Added Basic HTTP Auth possibilities (via config file) * Added a Settings page with multiple small options * Added an Option to customize the FeedItem Order * Redesigned the Categories View and Feeds View * Hopefully fixed connecting with untrusted SSL- Certs
item.dc:creator: Hauke Schade

item.title: Version 0.1.4
item.description: * Added feedicons for special feeds * Added a proper harmattan icon * Added a mark read/unread button in the FeedItem View
item.dc:creator: Hauke Schade

item.title: Version 0.1.2
item.description: * Added french translations * Added privacy policy
item.dc:creator: Hauke Schade

item.title: Version 0.1.1
item.description: * A better AboutView * Improved Spanish Translation * A better ShowAll/ShowUnreadOnly Button
item.dc:creator: Hauke Schade

item.title: Version 0.1.0
item.description: Initial Release with Spanish, English and German Translations
item.dc:creator: Hauke Schade
